I've talked (/evangelized/propagandized/etc) about this podcast a bit on other social media, but if you're at all interested in #podcasts, #racism, #politics, #socialjustice, or even just #history I can't recommend this enough:

http://podcast.cdsporch.org/seeing-white/ 

The host is great, but he brings on all sorts of experts who have studied race/racism for decades and can explain exactly where (and who!) it came from, how it works, and who it benefits. Here's a quick teaser if you're into that sort of thing:

https://youtu.be/z-gTCeaY-6I
